1062.issue: [E1062] js-controller dependency missing. js-controller 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please add to dependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/AlGu1/ioBroker.hombot/blob/master/io-package.json).

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/AlGu1/ioBroker.hombot/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/AlGu1/ioBroker.hombot/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/AlGu1/ioBroker.hombot/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/AlGu1/ioBroker.hombot/blob/master/io-package.json).
